Danish farmers must cut production to achieve climate goal, says government advisorDenmark's farmers must reduce production by as much as one-fifth by 2030 if the country is to achieve its ambitious climate goals, a government-commissioned group said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:26:18 GMT FX3DGZXZORI4JHNSOIYGHS26NM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/danish-farmers-must-cut-product-achieve-climate-goal-says-government-advisor-2024-02-21/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Israel's parliament backs Netanyahu's opposition to 'unilateral' creation of Palestinian stateIsrael's parliament voted on Wednesday to back Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's declaration opposing the 'unilateral' creation of Palestinian state, following growing international calls for the revival of efforts to reach a two state solution to the decades-long conflict. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:15:27 GMT OGTT4THMZJVFNKMBCNVBEAQWM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israels-parliament-backs-netanyahus-opposition-uniside-creation-palestinian-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中东
Gaza death toll rises to 29,313, Rafah residents killed in strikeIsrael stepped up its bombardment of the southern city of Rafah, residents said on Wednesday, as the death toll in the war across the devastated Palestinian strip rose to 29,313, according to the Gaza health ministry. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 13:12:46 GMT TE5JQAIIARKFRG5VWDNRA5DIVA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-death-toll-rises-29313-rafah-residents-killed-strike-2024-02-21/Bassam Masoud, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
Israeli airstrike kills woman and child in south Lebanon-sourcesAn Israeli strike killed a woman and a child in south Lebanon on Wednesday, sources in Lebanon said, days after Hezbollah vowed to inflict a price on Israel for killing civilians in the conflict across the Israeli-Lebanese border. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:58:28 GMT FSGEQQ2BOBIANGRMLTPT3W63V4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-airstrike-kills-woman-child-south-lebanon-sources-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中东
Russia lacks ammunition production needed for Ukraine war, Western officials sayRussia does not have sufficient domestic ammunition production to meet its needs in the Ukraine war, Western officials said on Wednesday, speaking on condition of anonymity. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:40:46 GMT I5626KR3XJIWPH4K4MXXTCC25Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-lacks-ammunition-product-needed-ukraine-war-western-officials-say-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Lula meets Blinken after Gaza comments spark diplomatic riftU.S. top diplomat Antony Blinken met President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Wednesday, amid a diplomatic spat after the Brazilian leader likened Israel's war in Gaza to the Nazi genocide during World War Two. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:32:18 GMT Q2IWIXV3ZFOP3OIE64ILCNDYXA https://www.reuters.com/world/lula-meets-blinken-after-gaza-comments-spark-diplomatic-rift-2024-02-21/Simon Lewis世界
EU top court dismisses bid to drop Halloumi protected statusA top court in the European Union on Wednesday rejected an attempt to drop the protected status of Halloumi, staving off a challenge on the prized cheese that is one of Cyprus's top exports. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:04:17 GMT LIFS2LTSOROVXGBN2ANSCCIUJI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-top-court-dismisses-bid-drop-halloumi-protected-status-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Senegal election: President Sall “slow” to set date, opposition saysOpposition candidates in Senegal's presidential election have accused the authorities of dragging their feet on setting a new date for the vote after a court ruled that a 10-month postponement was unlawful. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 12:01:53 GMT N2HD7MIMGRKS3N22UOUZ7BD4FM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/senegal-opposition-says-president-sall-is-too-slow-scheduling-vote-2024-02-21/Reuters世界非洲
Pet dogs bring both joy and worry to displaced Gaza teenagerKeeping three dogs while living in a tent on a beach in Gaza complicates an already difficult situation, but the smile on teenager Hassan Abu Saman's face when he pets the animals shows that it's worth the trouble for him. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 11:52:31 GMT 3WTQQYRLJJMAXCNPFKKTMGREE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/pet-dogs-bring-both-joy-worry-displaced-gaza-teenager-2024-02-21/Saleh Salem, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
Indonesia Prabowo's school meal programme to cost $7.7 bln in first yearA plan by Indonesia's likely new president Prabowo Subianto to provide free school lunches and milk will cost up to 120 trillion rupiah ($7.68 billion) in its first year, his team said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 11:47:56 GMT U2BZVFO4DRJWHGFTEVMYCUVLMU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-prabowos-school-meal-programme-cost-77-bln-first-year-2024-02-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Protesting Spanish farmers drive hundreds of tractors to MadridConvoys of tractors disrupted traffic around the Spanish capital on Wednesday as farmers protesting against what they see as excessive red tape and insufficient state aid converged in downtown Madrid to march towards the Agriculture Ministry. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 11:32:19 GMT XNXGB3ZWUFM6NAUVVDBOGMNPKY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/protesting-spanish-farmers-drive-hundreds-tractors-madrid-2024-02-21/Catarina Demony, Guillermo Martinez世界欧洲
